titleStmt.title: Ecclesia enucleata: The temple opened: Or, A clear demonstration of the true gospel-church in its nature and consitution, according to the true doctrine and practice of Christ and his apostles. By I.C.
titleStmt.author: Chauncy, Isaac, 1632-1712.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by George Larkin at the lower end of Broadstreet, next to London-Wall,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Dr. Williams' Library, London.
